meanings.definition: A female domestic servant in East Asia.
meanings.sent1: The amah cleaned the house every day.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother used to have an amah when she was young.
meanings.sent3: The amah accidentally spilled tea on the master's shirt.
meanings.sent4: She moved around the house swiftly like an amah on a mission.
meanings.sent5: The amah's dedication to her work was truly admirable.

meanings.sent1: The amah took care of the children while their parents were at work.
meanings.sent2: The royal family hired an amah to look after the newborn prince.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous toddler always managed to outsmart the amah.
meanings.sent4: She was like an amah, nurturing and protective towards the children.
meanings.sent5: The amah's lullabies always put the children to sleep peacefully.

meanings.definition: A woman who works as a housekeeper.
meanings.sent1: The amah dusted the furniture and mopped the floors diligently.
meanings.sent2: Our neighbor hired an amah to help with the household chores.
meanings.sent3: The amah found a clever way to organize the messy pantry.
meanings.sent4: She was the amah of cleanliness, leaving no corner untouched.
meanings.sent5: The amah's efficiency in tidying up the house was impressive.
